rules.natural: If the organization deploys the vehicle, then the organization achieves mission success
If the organization encounters a logistical delay, then should the organization mobilize volunteers, the organization achieves mission success
If the organization completes its assessment of the region, then the organization achieves mission success
Either the organization completes its assessment of the region or the organization identifies critical need in the region
If the organization identifies critical need in the region, then the organization distributes supplies in the region
If the organization distributes supplies in the region, then the organization achieves mission success
If the organization provides medical aid in the region, then the organization achieves mission success

Either the organization suspends operations or if it is not the case that failure of critical need identification to lead to medical aid provision results in escalation to headquarters, then the organization does not receive additional funding
If the organization secures permission for the region, then the organization deploys the vehicle
Either the organization receives local support in the region or if the organization faces a blockade in the region, then the organization uses an alternative route in the region
If the organization activates its emergency plan, then the organization achieves mission success
Either the organization activates its emergency plan or the organization mobilizes volunteers
If the vehicle experiences equipment failure, then provided that the organization mobilizes volunteers, the organization achieves mission success
Either the vehicle experiences equipment failure or the organization encounters a logistical delay
If the identification of critical need in the region does not lead to the provision of medical aid in the region, then the organization does not escalate the situation to headquarters
If having access to the region does not result in securing permission for the region, then the organization faces a blockade in the region
If the failure of critical need identification to lead to medical aid provision does not trigger escalation to headquarters, then the organization receives additional funding

facts.natural: The organization has access to the region
The organization does not suspend operations
The organization does not use an alternative route in the region
The organization does not receive local support in the region

If the organization has access to the region, then the organization deploys the vehicle
If the organization mobilizes volunteers, then the organization achieves mission success
If the organization identifies critical need in the region, then the organization achieves mission success
If the failure of critical need identification to lead to medical aid provision does not trigger escalation to headquarters, then the organization does not receive additional funding
If the identification of critical need in the region does not lead to the provision of medical aid in the region, then the organization escalates the situation to headquarters
If the organization identifies critical need in the region, then the organization provides medical aid in the region
If the organization identifies critical need in the region, then the organization achieves mission success

(A1 → G).natural: If the organization deploys the vehicle, then the organization achieves mission success

(A10 → (A8 → G)).natural: If the organization encounters a logistical delay, then should the organization mobilize volunteers, the organization achieves mission success

(A11 → G).natural: If the organization completes its assessment of the region, then the organization achieves mission success

(A11 ∨ A12).natural: Either the organization completes its assessment of the region or the organization identifies critical need in the region

(A12 → A13).natural: If the organization identifies critical need in the region, then the organization distributes supplies in the region

(A12 → A14).natural: If the organization identifies critical need in the region, then the organization provides medical aid in the region

(A12 → G).natural: If the organization identifies critical need in the region, then the organization achieves mission success

(A13 → G).natural: If the organization distributes supplies in the region, then the organization achieves mission success

(A14 → G).natural: If the organization provides medical aid in the region, then the organization achieves mission success

(A17 ∨ (¬(¬(A12 → A14) → A15) → ¬A16)).natural: Either the organization suspends operations or if it is not the case that failure of critical need identification to lead to medical aid provision results in escalation to headquarters, then the organization does not receive additional funding

(A2 → A1).natural: If the organization has access to the region, then the organization deploys the vehicle

(A2 → A3).natural: If the organization has access to the region, then the organization secures permission for the region

(A3 → A1).natural: If the organization secures permission for the region, then the organization deploys the vehicle

(A5 → A4).natural: If the organization faces a blockade in the region, then the organization uses an alternative route in the region

(A6 ∨ (A5 → A4)).natural: Either the organization receives local support in the region or if the organization faces a blockade in the region, then the organization uses an alternative route in the region

(A7 → G).natural: If the organization activates its emergency plan, then the organization achieves mission success

(A7 ∨ A8).natural: Either the organization activates its emergency plan or the organization mobilizes volunteers

(A8 → G).natural: If the organization mobilizes volunteers, then the organization achieves mission success

(A9 → (A8 → G)).natural: If the vehicle experiences equipment failure, then provided that the organization mobilizes volunteers, the organization achieves mission success

(A9 ∨ A10).natural: Either the vehicle experiences equipment failure or the organization encounters a logistical delay

(¬(A12 → A14) → A15).natural: If the identification of critical need in the region does not lead to the provision of medical aid in the region, then the organization escalates the situation to headquarters

(¬(A12 → A14) → ¬A15).natural: If the identification of critical need in the region does not lead to the provision of medical aid in the region, then the organization does not escalate the situation to headquarters

(¬(A2 → A3) → A4).natural: If having access to the region does not result in securing permission for the region, then the organization uses an alternative route in the region

(¬(¬(A12 → A14) → A15) → ¬A16).natural: If the failure of critical need identification to lead to medical aid provision does not trigger escalation to headquarters, then the organization does not receive additional funding
